entry.title: Cartoon logic
entry.summary:
Author: FearTheHime

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,516Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 32

Summary: "Why does everything have to be so boring and a letdown?"When stuff happens, people say forgive and forget, to be the bigger person and all the fruity shit like that. [M/N] tried that, he tried to be nice and tried to be resume his life. But he couldn't brutally robbed of his future by Spider-Man, New York's favorite hero. Accidental and left [M/N] with limp and chronic pain that made his life in sufferable, as his dreams were sliced in half and forced onto a different path. How he would give so much to be able to live again without pain, without stress and pressure.To be free and get what he desires most. But that's not how life works and [M/N] is forced to be content with it.Until he finds a mask."I'm green and mean and not a fighting machine~!"

entry.title: Burning House
entry.summary:
Author: Yes_I_have_daddy_issues

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,014Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 31

Summary: We were kids together, growing up in the same crime ridden alleyways and neighborhoods, just two doors down the road from each other. “I’ll find a way.” he turned back to face me, a big smile stretching across his face, one I would never forget, the light in his eyes visible.I never saw Jason again after that night. Not in person at least.On the news, getting adopted by Bruce Wayne of all people, waving and smiling to the cameras, it never reached his eyes the way his smile always did when we were younger.Then he vanished for good.

entry.title: Tutor's Brother
entry.summary:
Author: missesstargirl

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,160Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: You were supposed to be focusing on passing physics with Tim Drake’s tutoring. Instead, Jason Todd keeps showing up at Wayne Manor, all rough edges, sly smiles, and the kind of attention that makes it impossible to think straight.What starts as teasing and casual flirtation quickly spirals into stolen glances, dangerous touches, and a reckless encounter in the library that leaves you aching for more. Tutoring sessions were never meant to be this distracting… or this dangerous.

entry.title: Red Hood, Green Heart
entry.summary:
Author: Persadol

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,847Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 57

Summary: Jason Todd has died before-and he hasn't quite come back whole. Haunted by shadows of his past and the weight of justice in Gotham, he finds comfort only in silence and the static crackle of Alfred's voice in his comms.That is, until the night a portal rips open above him and a very unexpected visitor-blue-skinned, horned, and definitely not from this world-crashes straight into his life. Literally.You're a druid from the forests of the Forgotten Realms, on a peaceful path of healing and harmony… until a bandit ambush and a wild spell gone wrong land you flat on top of a masked stranger in a dark, alien city.Jason doesn't do magic. You don't do guns. But somehow, between Gotham rooftops and druidic spells, trauma and trust, gunfire and green growth-you might just change each other's worlds.

entry.title: I Left My Heart in Wynwood
entry.summary:
Author: xbeautifulxrealityx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 712,750Chapters: 95/?Kudos: 645

Summary: A high-stakes heist in Miami should have been a straightforward job, but when you unexpectedly run into your insufferable ex, who makes you the offer of a lifetime.. things spiral out of control. Amidst a whirlwind of chaotic encounters and sizzling new flings, you’re pulled deeper into the lucrative world of alien tech development. As you juggle ambition, romance, and a web of deceit, every reckless decision sends shockwaves through your life. In a world where illusions rule and betrayal lurks at every turn, you must navigate a treacherous path to build your own empire and rise from the ashes of your past.
